summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Terry Avenue and Terry Avenue North, from Virginia Street to Valley Street; Boren Avenue North, from the south margin of Mercer Street to Valley Street; 9th Avenue, from Virginia Street to Westlake Avenue; Lenora Street, from 8th Avenue to Denny Way; Denny Way, John Street, Thomas Street and Republican Street, each from Westlake Avenue North to Terry Avenue North; and Mercer Street, from Westlake Avenue North to Boren Avenue North; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6409, of the City Council of the City of Seattle creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
